content: Merchant Onboard for Odero.az. Finish registration, sign a contract and get access to payment methods.

main.title: Tell us about your situation
main.option1: You are a freelance or independent contractor (VAT payer)
main.option2: You are a freelance or independent contractor (Non VAT payer)
main.option4: You have a company (Non VAT payer)

help.title: Welcome to Odero Onboard Procedure.
help.subtitle: We need an information about your business in order for us to prepare your contract. Please have your business and personal documents ready and nearby.
help.helperSubtitle: VAT Payer* - Value Added Tax Payer. VAT payer is a taxable person registered by the tax authority office as obliged to pay VAT.

help.title: Are you the legal representative?
help.subtitle: If so, please provide your contact information at which we can reach you anytime 24/7. Remember, this information will be used to represent your party in the contract.

help.title: Have questions? We are here for you.
help.subtitle: How do I know which form of operations corresponds to my business? If you have merchants who sell their products on your website, then you are a MARKETPLACE.

main.title: Provide us with contact information for your business

help.title: What if I don't have a website?
help.subtitle: No worries at all! If you sell your product via social media, you can pass a link to your social media accounts.

help.title: Document upload rules!
help.option1: All documents must be in pdf format.
help.option2: If you have old-gen ID card, scan the back side and upload it via optional documents.
help.option3: Optional documents can be omitted, if you do not require them.

main.title: Thanks for your time!
main.title2: And congratulations, we have successfully received your onboard application ‚úÖ
main.subtitle: What's next? We will send you the contract soon, if everything is in order.
